title: Matchmaking
body: riot please, im level 23 and for some reason the past two games i was placed against 2 plats and 1 gold in one then in the next i was placed against a platinum and a silver, how is this fair?

replies.body:
Normals mmr and ranked mmr are not the same.
In normals you will be matched with anyone and everyone.

A lot of higher ranked players (in ranked), have low normal mmr as they don't play that queue that often. This can sometimes lead to them getting matched with lower level players.

You also have to take into consideration that these players might be duo with a friend that is lower level, or rank, and that could result in the match.

Due to our small oceanic server population, it isn't going to be changing anytime soon. Just learn to accept it and eventually you will bring yourself up to their level.
